title: National Basketball Association all-time minutes leaders 1946 to 2020
summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing NBA player, and Number of minutes played in each NBA player on the y axis.
The Number of minutes played is appeared to be the highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.
The difference of Number of minutes played between the highest and lowest NBA player is 16720.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of minutes played for 30 number of NBA players.
The maximum Number of minutes played 57446.0 is found at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and the minimum is found at Bill Russell where NBA player is 40726.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing NBA player, and Number of minutes played in each NBA player on the y axis.
The Number of minutes played is appeared to be the highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.
The difference of Number of minutes played between the highest and lowest NBA player is 16720.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of minutes played for 30 number of NBA players.
The Number of minutes played is appeared to be the highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.
The difference of Number of minutes played between the highest and lowest NBA player is 16720.0.
The NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar has the highest Number of minutes played, followed by Karl Malone, and Dirk Nowitzki. Down to the NBA player Bill Russell which is the lowest.
The highest value 57446.0 at Kareem Abdul-Jabbar is almost 1.24 times larger than the average value 46312.27.
Summing up the values of all NBA players, we get total 1389368.0.
